ygData.subject: Re: Slayer / Weaponfire in the ocean
ygData.msgSnippet: Well that is the biggest exaggeration of anything that ive heard. As RDahl stated Decpeticons and Autobots were firing missiles at each other underwater

Well that is the biggest exaggeration of anything that ive heard. As 
RDahl stated Decpeticons and Autobots were firing missiles at each 
other underwater without any problems that he stated. And as for 
physically possible, are we forgeting that TF physics and human 
physics are two entirely different things? And Yan who has 
complained? I mean really if players have that many complaints about 
something they should really have the guts to say something to the 
player so that they may be able to clear up any questioning stuff. 
Instead of going behind the players back and complaining without 
wanting any explanation. And Ive talked with a great many players who 
feel that way too. The point of the second Infecticon base is to be 
heavily defended and hard to reach, because it is the most important. 
> LN, the energy required to push a missile up from the bottom of the 
ocean ot anywhere would probably be able to power Manhatton (yeah, I 
spelled it wrong, oh well) for several years. Having your base that 
far down under is a tradeoff I guess. I toned your weapons list down 
without realizing the depth, but with all the complaints I've been 
getting I think a good tradeoff (and physically possible) would be to 
have almost no defences since its that far down.
> 
> 
> 
> Also, LN, the council's been recieving complaints about you acting 
like a council member. You've been telling members what they can and 
cannot do, and you've made quite alot of people's RPGing experience 
much worse. Please stop this instantly. The council has the job of 
policeing the RPG, and we'll call a mode if we see it. Until such a 
time when you are on the council, though, please refrain from 
attempting to moderate the RPG.
